definitions.definition: A Swedish - style buffet comprising a variety of cold sandwiches and other dishes ; ( by extension ) any buffet with a wide selection of dishes.
An abundant and diverse collection of things .

main_definition: A Swedish - style buffet comprising a variety of cold sandwiches and other dishes ; ( by extension ) any buffet with a wide selection of dishes.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) An abundant and diverse collection of things .
